thread.title_full: Farhan Akhtar and ex-wife Adhuna Bhabnani get together for daughter Akira's birthday : Celebrities, News - India Today

title: Farhan Akhtar and ex-wife Adhuna Bhabnani get together for daughter Akira's birthday : Celebrities, News - India Today
text:
Farhan Akhtar and ex-wife Adhuna Bhabnani get together for daughter Akira's birthday Farhan Akhtar and ex-wife Adhuna Bhabnani got together to celebrate the birthday of their daugther Akira yesterday. IndiaToday.in | Written by Devarsi Ghosh Adhuna Bhabnani (L), Farhan Akhtar with Akira and her friends (R) | Photos by Yogen Shah 
Anything for the kids. 
Farhan Akhtar and ex-wife Adhuna Bhabnani were recently spotted in Mumbai celebrating their daughter Akira's birthday with her friends. 
While Adhuna was dressed in a white shirt and blue denims, Farhan Akhtar was wearing a black t-shirt and cargo shorts. Little Akira was accompanied by her friends and the group seemed to be having a gala time. Photo: Yogen Shah 
Farhan and Adhuna is not the only couple-that-was which got together after divorce. Even Hrithik Roshan and Sussanne Khan have been frequently spotted catching up together. Be all you can be Be fearless my child, be free. pic.twitter.com/5SJTkWkLe6 â€” Farhan Akhtar (@FarOutAkhtar) February 12, 2017 
Yesterday, Farhan also shared a picture of himself with daughter Akira. With the quote, 'Be all you can be. Be fearless my child, be free,' Farhan's picture featured dad and daughter sharing a goofy, childish moment. 
Milkha Singh inside them, says Farhan Akhtar To get the latest entertainment news and gossip, follow us on Twitter @Showbiz_IT and Like us on facebook.com/IndiaToday For news and videos in Hindi, go to AajTak.in . ताज़ातरीन ख़बरों और वीडियो के लिए आजतक.इन पर आएं.
